name: 15 Minutes to Live DX
description:
The year is 20XX. Ageing is a thing of the past, and all humans have predetermined lifespans, shown by digital clocks embedded in their arm. Time can be bought, sold, or traded - just like a currency.

You are Vance Anderson. Your lifespan has just been stolen. You have 15 minutes to live... unless you can find whoever is responsible.

Originally created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 44, where it placed 21st overall and 3rd in the Theme category, this "DX" version contains a number of enhancements.

Controls:

  • Arrows: Move
  • Z: Talk / Interact
  • X: View inventory
